item.description:
Members,

Don't forget to take a look at the charming photos that Joan (Jack and Petie's mom) took at the Dec. 6th small dog meet at Holliston Meadows on our home page.

Our next meet will be January 16th, from 3-5 pm, at Holliston Meadows, 140 Summer Street, Holliston, MA 01746.

This will be our permanent meetup site. It is clean, elegant, brand new, cozy, and the staff is angelic to us.
A refreshing change from previous sites which were very helpful and accomodating but bigger and more institutional.

Thanks to Flower Kausel for volunteering to help me with the meets. She is our new co-organizer, and the owner of Joswe, a beautiful Havanese.

Please tell other small dog owners about our meetup.

Please RSVP and let me know what you will bring re: food or beverage.

Happiest of Holidays!

Small dog best,'Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEETUP SUNDAY January 17th, 1pm - 5 pm., Holliston
